title: First Person Shooter
description: First Person Shooter is a simple 3D video game where you take control of the yellow team and try to remain as the last team standing.
The AI soldiers are capable of navigating through the various environments and can be very lethal in close combat, depending on the difficulty level.
With both guns and grenades as weapons and various obstacles scattered throughout the maps, there is a significant amount of strategy required to beat the opposing teams.
